trans-unit.source: Indicates the progress of an operation.
trans-unit.target: 指示操作的进度。

trans-unit.source: A ProgressBar control consists of a window that is filled, by default from left to right, as an operation progresses.
trans-unit.target: ProgressBar 控件包含一个窗口，其中填充，默认情况下从左到右，操作进度。

trans-unit.source: The control has a range and a current position.
trans-unit.target: 该控件具有范围和当前的位置。

trans-unit.source: ProgressBar overrides the metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property and sets its default to 100.
trans-unit.target: ProgressBar 重写的元数据<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>属性并将其默认设置为 100。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: ProgressBar overrides the metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property and sets its default to `false`.
trans-unit.target: ProgressBar 重写的元数据<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>属性并将其默认设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ProgressBar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ProgressBar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ProgressBar 控件到自定义适用于多个进度栏控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ProgressBar, see [ProgressBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于进度条的状态，请参阅[进度栏样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ProgressBar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 ProgressBar 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref> shows actual values or generic, continuous progress feedback.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref>显示实际值或泛型的连续进度反馈。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> animates a few bars moving across the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> in a continuous manner and ignores the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>进行动画处理跨移动的几条<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>以连续方式，并忽略<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref> shows actual values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref> shows generic progress.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref>显示实际值;<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref>显示泛型的进度。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar.IsIndeterminate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar.IsIndeterminate*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar.IsIndeterminate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Called when a template is applied to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 模板应用到时调用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供适当<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ProgressBarAutomationPeer"></xref>实现此控件，作为的一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]自动化基础结构。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 特定于类型的<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>实现。

trans-unit.source: Updates the current position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 更新的当前位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar"></xref>时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>
